Name: evtevent
Description: identifies the event for which this trigger fires

Name: evtenabled
Description: controls in which session_replication_role modes the event trigger fires. o = trigger fires in "origin" and "local" modes, d = trigger is disabled, r = trigger fires in "replica" mode, a = trigger fires always.

Name: evttags
Description: command tags for which this trigger will fire. if null, the firing of this trigger is not restricted on the basis of the command tag.
